amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce funds for salaries and expenses of the Office of Public and Indian Housing by $6.5 million and to apply the savings to the spending reduction account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce the Public and Indian Housing account by $6,500,000, and apply the savings to the deficit reduction account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Broun (GA) amendment (A017) Failed by recorded vote: 168 - 256 (Roll no. 424).
